directions: Bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes; cook until tender but still firm. Drain and return to stove over low heat to dry for 1 to 2 minutes.
Add butter, Parmesan cheese, chives, cream cheese, garlic, salt, and pepper. Use a potato masher to mash until smooth, and serve.
ingredients: 1/2 medium head garlic, peeled and minced
1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
title: The Best Mashed Potatoes
